details.name: description
details.old_value:
At the moment a single icons (blue "!") is used to display who is currently talking.
Add some more icons variety to improve in-game communication - without overloading the game unnecessarily.

Add them to the compass for FT members too.

See f.e.:
* http://activegamer.net/et/files/?minimods&minimod=23

subject: Add more visual voice icons
description:
At the moment a single icons (blue "!") is used to display who is currently talking.
Add some more icons variety to improve in-game communication - without overloading the game unnecessarily.

Add them to the compass for FT members too.

See f.e.:
* https://www.gamefront.com/games/wolfenstein-enemy-territory/file/emot-1
* https://www.gamefront.com/games/wolfenstein-enemy-territory/file/v6-voice-chat-icons-1
* https://www.gamefront.com/games/wolfenstein-enemy-territory/file/voice-chat-icons
* https://www.gamefront.com/games/wolfenstein-enemy-territory/file/emot
